article.title: QinetiQ North America to Support Naval Criminal Investigative Service
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: QinetiQ North America's Mission Solutions Group has been awarded a three-year, firm-fixed-price contract to deliver security services to the Naval Criminal Investigative Service (NCIS). The company's security and intelligence services business unit will support the NCIS security program in Washington, D.C. QinetiQ North America's security team will provide a range of services to NCIS.
